Articles.Content:
If the ksp 2 team wants to make planetary exploration more intresting I think that having life on other planets or moons like laythe, merbel and puff or lapat just imagine if you have a submarine in the deep oceans of puff and seeing a shark like thing swim right past you or imagean if you just landed on lapat after decades of traveling you do an Eva and you walk over a hill and just see a massive herd of some sort dinosaur looking thing i think that would be an awesome idea

Thx for reading
Welcome to the forum @Fworg! Your interesting idea has been moved from KSP Discussion to KSP 2 Discussion.

theres a rumor that theres vegetation on one of the ksp 2 planets

i really do hope that they add life to atleast 1 planet, it could even be underwater life
